title: Greatest Seasons of the Tiger Era -- Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy, Vijay Singh
headline: The Greatest Seasons of the Tiger Era
description: For two golden months in 2014, Rory McIlroy was unstoppable. Yet, where does his season stack up against the all-time greats? In the Tiger Woods era alone, it barely cracks the top 10. Here are the 10 best individual seasons since Tiger turned pro in 1996.
short_headline: The Greatest Seasons of the Tiger Era
page_title: Greatest Seasons of the Tiger Era -- Tiger Woods, Rory McIlroy, Vijay Singh
slug: The Greatest Seasons of the Tiger Era
body: For two golden months in 2014, Rory McIlroy was unstoppable. Yet, where does his season stack up against the all-time greats? In the Tiger Woods era alone, it barely cracks the top 10. Here are the 10 best individual seasons since Tiger turned pro in 1996.
